name: Sewer Rave
storyline:
Hey there buddy, you've been cordially invited to the sewer for the biggest rat party ever hosted. 
We've got cheese, fruit, sewer water, and danger. 
Wander the sewer and find messed up rats, old food, and maybe buried treasure(?). 
Come along and make a friend or two.
summary: Sewer Rave is a surreal randomized exploration game where you crawl around a rat infested sewer during a giant rave. Search the labyrinthine sewers to discover games, secrets, and wisdoms meant only for rodents. Grab a cup of sludge and meet some rats!
